  - name: SwimController.PitchMaxTorque
    summary: |
      The maximum torque used to rotate to the desired pitch.
    description: |
      The maximum torque used to rotate on the local X axis to the desired
      pitch orientation. Has no effect if Class.ControllerBase.RigidityEnabled
      is true.

  - name: SwimController.PitchSpeedFactor
    summary: |
      Multiplied by Class.ControllerManager.BaseTurnSpeed to determine the
      maximum angular velocity for pitch.
    description: |
      Multiplied by Class.ControllerManager.BaseTurnSpeed to determine the
      maximum angular velocity rotating on the local X axis. Has no effect
      if Class.ControllerBase.RigidityEnabled is true.
